channel.title: Pvpmasters reborn
channel.description:
[SIZE=5]Welcome to PvpMasters.[/SIZE]
Pvpmasters, started couple of days ago and allready got 30+ players online daily!
Webclient - [url=http://pvpmasters.net/play.html]PvP Masters - Free Chaotic[/url] forums - [url=http://pvpmasters.net/forums/]Invision Power Board[/url]
Features: -Free chaotic wep. at the start. -Random effigy drop. -Webclient -active Forums -Vote4Reward -Frost Dragons drops visage and dragon masks -Jadinko Lair for abyssal vine whip. -Glacor Cavern for glaviens, ragefire and stead -Bounty Hunter -PK point system (ea kill 5 pkp) -Great Slayer system (all the slayer tasks can be found ingame so there's need for asking for a new task) -Barrows -Pest Control -flawless switching -Fight Caves - 2 Waves -8 Pking Areas -Completionist cape (requires all trainable skills 99) -Nex drops virtus,torva and pernix -Working Godwars -Tormented Demons that drops Dragon claws. -Summoning (with working specials) -Dungeoneering with compelexitys and floors! -Stable 24/7 -Polygore Dung for ganodormic armour & polypore staff -Revenants that drops pvp armours. -Dedi VPS hosted 24/7
PKP shop 1. [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2j14fx5.png[/img]
PKP shop 2. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/znx9qq.png[/img]
Monster/boss teleport interface. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2j67b4h.png[/img]
PK teleport. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2nhggo1.png[/img]
Skill interface. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/j8ku1d.png[/img]
Chaotic wep. at the start. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/3344umu.png[/img]
Unique home. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/30ctvl3.png[/img]
dungeoneering tab. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2elauxf.png[/img]
Summoning tab. [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2hx1xes.png[/img]
Shops at home pic. 1. [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1z3bfxh.png[/img]
Shops at home pic. 2. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/35ceiph.png[/img]
Donator shop 1. [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/14dzhjd.png[/img]
Donator shop 2. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/34imkjt.png[/img]

item.title: Pvpmasters reborn
item.dc:creator: @rubenn rubenn
item.description:
@rubenn wrote:

[SIZE=5]Welcome to PvpMasters.[/SIZE]

Pvpmasters, started couple of days ago and allready got 30+ players online daily!

Webclient - PvP Masters - Free Chaotic
forums - Invision Power Board

Features:
-Free chaotic wep. at the start.
-Random effigy drop.
-Webclient
-active Forums
-Vote4Reward
-Frost Dragons drops visage and dragon masks
-Jadinko Lair for abyssal vine whip.
-Glacor Cavern for glaviens, ragefire and stead
-Bounty Hunter
-PK point system (ea kill 5 pkp)
-Great Slayer system (all the slayer tasks can be found ingame so thereâ€™s need for asking for a new task)
-Barrows
-Pest Control
-flawless switching
-Fight Caves - 2 Waves
-8 Pking Areas
-Completionist cape (requires all trainable skills 99)
-Nex drops virtus,torva and pernix
-Working Godwars
-Tormented Demons that drops Dragon claws.
-Summoning (with working specials)
-Dungeoneering with compelexitys and floors!
-Stable 24/7
-Polygore Dung for ganodormic armour & polypore staff
-Revenants that drops pvp armours.
-Dedi VPS hosted 24/7
